website_summaries.verdict: Versatile table that’s a blend of rustic and industrial.
pros: The back cross frame adds stability
cons: Composite wood tabletop, and some chips were reported

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, perfect for my coffee bar / storage.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item assembled and I paired it with some IKEA baskets I had for storage. It was fairly easy to assemble although the directions I got were a little faint so they were hard to read. It comes with this crazy weight to attach to the underneath of the bottom shelf, which I did attach but then removed as I’m only using it for 10-15 lbs of stuff total. If you’re putting a TV and other heavy items on it make sure you don’t exceed the maximum weight and definitely put the stabilizing weight under the bottom shelf as instructed. Really good quality for the money too!
customer_reviews.author: Caz H.

customer_reviews.title: Changing station!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a tad taller! Love it! My husband and i are expecting our first child. We live in a two story home so we wanted to have a changing “station” for down stairs as our nursery is upstairs. So we decided to add this table in our laundry room, instead of a traditional changing table, so when baby is older i can reuse this table. i love the rustic look to it. I will be putting a changing pad on top of this table and all of the diapers, cream, etc in the baskets. So we wont have to go up and down stairs everytime a diaper needs changing. So pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Love this - I use it as my TV stand ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this - I use it as my TV stand rather than the proper TV stand that Sauder made for this line. It's very sturdy and gets assembled in about 15 minutes (if you use an electric hand drill). Using a screw driver is possible, but you will be frustrated and your arm will fall off from turning and turning. My living room is gray with teal blue accents and this is a perfect addition (I have the matching 5-shelf book shelves to match)
customer_reviews.author: Maureen D.

customer_reviews.title: Not just a tv stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this table - quick shipment, great item and easy to put together. A bit heavy for me to drag inside (UPS left by the curb and the box was heavily damaged but the item was just fine) but I managed because I couldn't wait to put it together. I'm using it in the kitchen as a table for my baking items (KitchenAid Mixer, Vitamix Blender, tray of sugar/flours and lots of cook books). Everything all together - looks professional but everything is out of my way when I don't need them. I could also see using by my front door so it's versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Like Wood Shelevs all Scratched
customer_reviews.text: Received the box of pieces to assemble. The packaging didn't protect two of the shelves and there are white scrapes in the plastic/wood. Assembled table and tried to clean the white marks off. They were in the plastic/wood. Now we have to disassemble, return and reorder. What a hassle. The console table has a great look for the price. I'm using it on an outdoor porch.
customer_reviews.author: valli Horwitz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of open space
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to assemble holds everything I needed; a TV, and I home, a laptop, salt Rock lamp, and a wax burner. It looks super nice and matches my bookshelves the only complaint I have is it's a little uneven although I guess maybe my floor is slanted? Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: phenom

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bookcase/tv stand/shelving unit. It seems pretty sturdy. I didn't even think about it, but I comes with a hidden weight to keep it balanced. Easy to assemble. I had minimal help from my husband. I especially love the industrial look.
customer_reviews.author: Journey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this table
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this table. I am using it as a bar. It has lots of space and is very sturdy. The only reason i did not rate it higher is because one of the cross arms on the back was short. I had to finagle some weird screw configuration to keep it together. I would have returned it but i had taken an hour to put it together and the cross arm is hidden and nobody will ever notice. If i could get a longer cross arm that allows it to be fastened properly I'd rate it higher because its a good looking table.
customer_reviews.author: Meech

customer_reviews.title: Elegant stand
customer_reviews.text: Finish the look in our dinning area! I am glad that I found this piece! The shelf is NOT hardwood, it is engineered wood with wood feeling stickers on the surface. So don’t scratch the surface or drag anything pointy on it.
customer_reviews.author: Wenjun

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it looks and it wasn't hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks and it wasn't hard to assemble, however the descriptions says that it is wood (and Target website says that it is wood plywood) but this is an engineered wood product.
customer_reviews.author: Mystie

customer_reviews.title: Well made Console/shelving
customer_reviews.text: The product was well packed. The instructions were very detailed and all parts were lettered or numbered. The color was slightly darker than the picture, which was great!. It has a weight that attaches to the bottom which makes if very sturdy. The bottom legs also were padded, so no scratches on our bamboo floor. Looks great in our house
customer_reviews.author: HMan

customer_reviews.title: Great display console, won’t regret buying!
customer_reviews.text: I love, Love this console, bought it for my daughter and she was amazed at the prize... Looked fabulous! Very sturdy,beautiful color, and amazed that we could fit so much on it! Not hard to assembly , we did it together took 20 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I bought it to use as a coffee bar and it works perfectly. It has enough space to place all of my desired items on the shelves and it is easy to wipe up. It was simple to put together and very easy to move around once built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and looks high quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered along with the matching side tables. Was skeptical of quality but not at all disappointed. They look and feel fantastic and are very sturdy. If I needed a new entertainment center or coffee table I’d order the rest of the set. We get lots of compliments on the set and I fully expect all of the pieces to stand up to long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Hallelujah Jaffar

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is the perfect corner accent we have needed for our home. It matches our end tables. I am so glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Littrell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy entry table
customer_reviews.text: Really a sturdy product and easy to put together. Packaging and protection was excellent. Using as an entry table and it looks nice. Don't expect real wood surfaces and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: I love Sauder furniture
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture. The item arrived with all of the parts and pieces securely packaged. I received a great console that was made in America and easy for me to assemble for a price I could afford. Win - win!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find this for $50 less than anywhere else. Matches all my other pieces and is a perfect fit for a dead space area.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: High quality and looks gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice quality TV stand! We were surprised at the weight and beauty given the price. Just a beautiful color and realistic texture. Not like it was posted on the surface like some things.
customer_reviews.author: Orion's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together last night. It's a very nice sturdy table. Heavy enough that it's not wobbly, butlight enough to easily move if needed. Very clean and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Kinney

customer_reviews.title: this shelf is great! Very sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: If you want farmhouse look, this shelf is great! Very sturdy and solid. It also is sold by Ballard for much more (and exactly the same shelf.). I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Fracke

customer_reviews.title: Looks like real wood
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product, it is sturdy and resembles wood. The price is on target with the product. I use it in my living room by the entrance. The three shelves let you put a lot of items on it. Books, pictures, etc.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: overall a great sturdy shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love the color wish it was a little bit wider but overall a great sturdy product
customer_reviews.author: vblanco

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this console table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this console table. Very high quality and I have received a number of compliments on it. It is fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Our living room decor is a cross between rustic and industrial. This works beautifully in the entry. Great for a farmhouse concept, too. Love the lighter color
customer_reviews.author: L Taber

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: A nice looking table, especially as it is reasonably priced. The only criticism I have is the corners of the top shelf are not well matched and are very sharp. I would love to sand but this part of the table is not wood (I thought it was),
customer_reviews.author: willis

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! It looks and feels so expensive. It’s very well made and feels sturdy. It was very easy to assemble as well. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: caitlin49

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this type of color. It definitely looks good in my space and it wasn’t hard to put together at all. It was bigger than I expected it to be and I liked that it had the weight attached to the bottom to help with balance
customer_reviews.author: Flormaria

customer_reviews.title: Nice Console Table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice console table. I use it in the dining area to hold kitchen items. Seems sturdy and was easy to put together. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JMM31

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece for the price. Easy to assemble, looks great, and I only needed a Phillips screwdriver to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly, was easy to assemble and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my space and added a great dimension for a small area. I assembled it in less than an hour and it looks great. A nice, solid structure for all my entertainment pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: Rustic shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf, the look is just what I like
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The stable was very easy to put together. I'm very happy with the sturdiness and the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: JEKramer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted and great quality for the value!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for sure!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this end table exactly what I was looking for. Looks better in person. Very easy to assemble, very sturdy and definitely worth the money. Use it as a shoe rack!!
customer_reviews.author: Dean L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice piece. easy to put together too
customer_reviews.author: Pam McNeal

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece!! It looks identical to a much more expensive version a friend of mine has. Very sturdy and easy (for my husband to) put together!
customer_reviews.author: User115890

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, doesn’t take too long! Looks very modern, perfect entryway table.
customer_reviews.author: Okamura

customer_reviews.title: The black weight helps keep in sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and the weight you add on the bottom makes it sturdy. I assembled it in about 20min with just a screwdriver!
customer_reviews.author: josefina

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s a heavy duty walkway table, the color came similarly close to what the pictures show. I feel it’s worth the price vs what I was shopping for in stores. Super cute barnyard feel
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and attractive
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for. Easy to assemble and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Christy A. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, attractive and just the right size for my laundry room. I using it for a foldin table and storage of laundry supplies. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Farmhouse Look
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It was easy to assemble, and looks beautiful! Perfect for the Farmhouse look I was trying to achieve.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Using it as extra counter space in the kitchen holding appliances and such.
customer_reviews.author: Substratum

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy 3 shelf storage
customer_reviews.text: This console is a sturdy one! The legs and frame are metal and it does not wobble at all. We received it quickly and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ritenburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Consul Table
customer_reviews.text: Great looking consul table as advertised. Easy to put together and sturdy. Took a long time to find the right table and this one fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Al Beaird

customer_reviews.title: all fits!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would hold my electronics....this does!! It's just what my space needed. Not too deep into my room....a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: meanjn

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and looks wonderful in my space
customer_reviews.text: The unit perfectly matched the description. It was easy to put together and looks wonderful in my space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table for the price. If they update the stabilizer bars on the back to strengthen the table I would definitely give it 5 stars. It was very to easy to assemble and everything fit together perfect.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas frazier

customer_reviews.title: excellent instructions and very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: excellent instructions and very easy to put together!! The packaging was impressive and the box was so protected that it wasn't going to get damaged during delivery!! Very happy with everything!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful, sturdy, and very well made! It was super easy and quick to put together! I would definitely buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful sofa table
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful sofa table. It was easy to put together and fit perfectly in the space. I love the design as our look is rustic western contemporary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Piece
customer_reviews.text: lovely looking, sturdy product. Extremely easy to assemble. Would recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Otherminds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. Very easy to put together & nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: jlc

customer_reviews.title: We were very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were not sure about ordering furniture online. We were very pleased with the product. I was susceptible because I replaced my "Sauder" furniture with all wood furniture throughout the house. I honestly couldn't be happier. What a nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! If fit perfectly, easy to put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: merve

customer_reviews.title: As expected - didn't disappoint. Love it when I get a product that ...
customer_reviews.text: As expected - didn't disappoint. Love it when I get a product that turns out as promised... Elegant, understated but THERE, gold accents, antique books stacked, a little tray, piecey mirror set above. Beautiful....
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Neufeld

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this console table...sturdy and new design is on point.
customer_reviews.author: P Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for my pantry and super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a custom look to my pantry, so I purchased two of these to serve as bottom shelving and then I purchased some floating shelves to install above. This console looks great, and the instructions are very easy to follow. Everything is labeled clearly and the packaging was excellent to ensure nothing was scratched, bent, etc. It has a weight that is attached to the bottom piece to avoid it tipping over, but you could easily install the wall mount straps for extra support. I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Cornhusker country gurl

product_meta.title: Sauder Canal Street Anywhere Console, For TV's up to 42", Northern Oak finish
product_meta.description: Color:Northern Oak FinishGive your home a modern industrial makeover With this anywhere console from the canal street collection It accommodates up to a 42" Tv and features two spacious 1" Thick shelves to store and display video/Gaming equipment movies bins décor and more! Detailed with a decorative powder-coated metal frame rear crossbars for stability and Northern Oak Finish This versatile stand makes the perfect statement piece in any room
feature_bullets: Accommodates up to a 42" TV weighing 35 lbs. or less
Finished on all sides for versatile placement
